subject: RE: [junit] Re: Using assertion outside testcase
msgSnippet: JUnit s assert* methods are static.  It seems that you could put assert* methods in your own methods.  For example, you can put lines like
messageBody:
JUnit's assert* methods are static. It seems that you could put assert*
methods in your own methods. For example, you can put lines like

TestCase.assertTrue(expectedValue, actualValue);

into your own method1(), method2(), etc. Would that work?


Todd.
